articles.title: Botswana's R102-billion pension fund appoints South African administrator - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: Botswana's Public Officers Pension Fund (BPOF), with 83 billion pula (R102-billion) in assets under management, has appointed South African advisory firm NMG Benefits to administrate the fund.
